gg.acai.aurora.model

Interface Model

  • All Superinterfaces:
    gg.acai.acava.io.Closeable, java.lang.Runnable, SavePoint, Serializer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExpectationMaximizationClusterModel, LinearRegressionModel, LogisticRegressionModel, LVQNeuralNetworkModel, NeuralNetworkModel, SentimentAnalyzerModel

    public interface Model
extends Serializer, SavePoint, gg.acai.acava.io.Closeable

    Model - A model that can be saved, loaded, deployed, and evaluated.

    The model interface is the base interface for all models, providing the basic functionality of saving, loading, deploying, and evaluating models.

    Since:
    02.04.2023 22:43 Â© Aurora - All Rights Reserved
    Author:
    Clouke
    See Also:
    Loading models, Saving models
